text: Konjengbam is a Meetei Manipuri surname or family name. People of this family mainly live in Manipur. People of Manipuri origin usually range between a vast myriad of religions. Examples include, christianity, buddhism, etc. == References == ==Other websites== * http://www.mychildnames.com/mobile/similar- surname.aspx?surname=Konjengbam * http://www.childnames.com/mobile/similarfamilyname.aspx?surname=Konjengbam Category:Meitei surnames
title: Konjengbam
